message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $10,000. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $12,000 is lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is still a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $10,000.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. I'm willing to go up to $13,500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I'm still holding out for $14,000.  That's a good compromise, and still a great deal for you, given the value to you.  Let's try to close this deal.  I don't want to lose this opportunity.
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with $14,000, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I understand your position.  I'm willing to go down to $13,500, meeting you halfway.  It's a good deal for both of us.  Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Can you see if you can do any better?
